body: The rules look like cosmetic changes only. Without multiple logs or replays I doubt this can be investigated further. Thanks for reporting anyway.

@Mailaender : why are you closing this ticket ? dont you think people should test this map and then post logs here ? so this can get solved ?
theres no need to close it.

> The rules look like cosmetic changes only.

http://resource.openra.net/maps/16482/

i played 14 matches today ... on different maps ... but crashed only on one ... (happend right after someone surrendered)


i have managed to reproduce this by my myself ... creating a server and joining with a 2nd client ... when i surrender with the 2nd client (1v1) the game will crash for both 

when i surrrender and there is more players (bots) in the game (ffa) ... then just the surrendered client will crash the others stay in the game ...
